caption.p: Trends of the current and future forest aboveground biomass. The current period (2000â€“2016) is summarized as observed and modeled values. The future periods (2020s, 2050s, 2080s) are summarized as two IPCC scenarios (RCP4.5 and RCP8.5) under the best-case circumstances of no disturbances. Points are means, error bars are standard deviations, thick lines are 50% quantiles (25% and 75%), and thin lines are 90% quantiles (5% and 95%)
